name: jira-ux-enhancer
description: Chrome extension that improves JIRA website user experience

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-files
scripts.build:chrome: npm run clean && npm run copy-files:chrome
scripts.build:firefox: npm run clean && npm run copy-files:firefox
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.copy-files: mkdir -p dist && cp -r *.js *.html *.css manifest.json icons dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.copy-files:chrome: mkdir -p dist && cp -r *.js *.html *.css manifest.json icons dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.copy-files:firefox: mkdir -p dist && cp -r *.js *.html *.css icons dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp manifest-firefox.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.package: npm run package:chrome && npm run package:firefox
scripts.package:chrome: npm run build:chrome && cd dist && zip -r ../jira-ux-enhancer-chrome.zip .
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:firefox && cd dist && zip -r ../jira-ux-enhancer-firefox.zip .
